title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. Search for references to this field.
OB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: We expect to see 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Build the external jar with version 200201151.
2. Perform a search for references to the specific field.
3. Double-click on the search result and observe that the first match is not selected.
